name: Flap The Bird
description:
Guide Flap The Bird in this adventure looking for food for its hungry family. This is a cute and challenging platformer in which you will help our little friend through various obstacles while catching bees as nourriture, but watch out! eventually the bees may riot and things'll get serious.

This game is been made with the purpose of the Mini Jam 99: Birds, using GB Studio for the Game Boy and Game Boy color and Analogue Pocket.

ActionGame Boy
WebMoveD-Padarrows / wasd
Strong Flap
AZ / J
Weak FlapBX / K
Level Info / Pause
StartEnterRestart Level
SelectShift
